description: Visit 51 traditional country pubs on this circular walk through the Peak District. The route starts an ends in Hayfield and explores some of the finest scenery and prettiest villages in the National Park. The route is spit into 6 stages as follows: Stage One : Hayfield to Hathersage (17.5 miles) Stage Two : Hathersage to Baslow (13 miles) Stage Three : Baslow to Youlgreave (12 miles) Stage Four : Youlgrave to Tideswell (16 miles) Stage Five : Tideswell to Castleton (14 miles) Stage Six : Castleton to Hayfield (11.5 miles) Walk highlights include the stunning Kinder Scout near the start of the route. Scroll down the page and you can see a list of the best pubs you will pass on the route. Many of them date back hundreds of years and still have interesting original features.
